characterDescription:
Midnight Mother is the alias by which Re-Shephir is known. She is one of the Unmade, a mysterious group of odious spren on Roshar. Her presence there is the source of the dark aura in Urithiru.
She is responsible for Midnight Essence, the creatures she births. Such is mentioned in the death rattle of a darkeyed dock worker:

characterDetails.Notes: Brandon has confirmed that the Unmade are Splinters of Odium. Odium splintered himself and created the Unmade to be his influence on Roshar. It is through the Unmade that Odium may be able to influence people in how they think or act.
